urls.title: Whinlatter Forest dam project to combat floods
urls.description: Made from logs, the dams in Whinlatter Forest are set to reduce peak river levels downstream.

tweets.text: The community the live near Bois Mill on the @RiverChess tell us not only highly discoloured but smell was terrible, the worst they remember. The @EnvAgency need to note this has nothing to do with storm events, no rain yesterday, this is entirely due to groundwater ingress. https://t.co/zPThbWUdBw

We‚Äôre working in partnership with @NDevonBiosphere @EnvAgencySW, the Woodland Trust and @NE_DCIoS to plant 40,000 trees to help improve water quality in the River Umber and at Combe Martin. Find out more here: https://t.co/q8yGULfhvg https://t.co/diyhrSOzLr

.@thameswater fined ¬£2.3m for polluting an #Oxfordshire stream with sewage that killed more than 1,110 fish from 13 different species.

READ the whole story of management failings and broken equipment ‚¨áÔ∏è.

Please call us if you suspect river #pollution: 0800 807060
#environment https://t.co/goOwgTCgMS

Slowly but surely we are removing pennywort from the Witham Catchment near Lincoln with @LionsEnv and support from @EnvAgencyMids . These before and after images are from the Catchwater Drain. If not removed it will quickly cover the channel.  https://t.co/RdefffRrBG https://t.co/elgVl5dTK9

Can you help us in our fight against #WasteCrime? 

We've launched a Waste Crime Survey to help us build a better intelligence picture across the country. 

Your responses will be kept confidential and anonymous. 

Complete the survey here: https://t.co/THxMyWjzgX https://t.co/2s6TGQONnn

1/3 Countryside Team Update: Tree planting at Monkmoor. 
Our team has planted an amazing 2,780 trees on the Monkmoor River Ground so far this winter & will be planting a further 300 this week. This work has been funded by @ShrewsburyTC, @EnvAgency & the #ERDF https://t.co/dWTPVaO0Lv

Breaking: @thameswater fined ¬£2.3m, with costs of nearly ¬£90,000 for ‚Äúentirely foreseeable‚Äù #pollution.

More than 1,100 fish died when equipment failures released sewage into 2 streams at Henley in 2016.
Please report suspected pollution in rivers and streams to us: 0800 807060 https://t.co/cIwVfJmJ8q
@ShrewsburyTC @EnvAgency Was all looking fantastic in the sun at the weekend. Top work!

Did anyone watch? it was an embarrassment to see how little we are doing in this country @EnvAgency to tackle this. Thank you @BBCPanorama for your work on this. There is a huge way to go to clear the litter and fly tipping pandemic in the U.K. https://t.co/W9JfJBvrcW

tweets.text:
Some water rescue scenarios for drill tonight.

Hard to believe that several times a year, the river calder fills to the point it meets the top of those arches üò≥ü§Ø https://t.co/AOjsMSblKr

Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

Thank you @TheParksTrust, @EnvAgencySE & @AnglianWater for this interesting article on #MiltonKeynes' flood defences. How long do you think the balancing lakes etc will suffice as the climate changes? https://t.co/1BRgm6OGFQ

The River Lavant is a chalk stream, one of only 225 in the world. For the first 6 months of 2019 it had raw sewage dumped into it.

And the @EnvAgency do what exactly? https://t.co/SMs615PuwP

tweets.text: Need accurate & honest information on @RiverChess sewage discharges, without this @EnvAgency will never solve these issues. Hope you are listening @JamesBevanEA you still owe the Public Account  Committee a correction to your correction about sewage discharges into Chalkstreams.

Construction work will begin later this year. 

The work will better protect homes from flooding in the Marygate, Earlsborough Terrace and Esplanade Court area. https://t.co/AJBhKeJb9j

The work is being done now to avoid bird nesting season.

We will be planting five trees to every tree felled. https://t.co/BFbQGkisCF

This week we start preliminary work on flood defence improvements in Museum Gardens, York. 

As part of this it‚Äôs necessary to remove 14 trees. This does not include the rare ‚ÄòTrue Service Tree‚Äô. https://t.co/6hAbxAChkc
@PlanAbby @EnvAgency @TE2100Plan Fantastic news Abby. Well done and good luck

#DYK there are only 200 chalk streams in the world?! The river Cray, #Bexley, is an urban chalk stream which faces pressures including litter, plastic pollution & toxic chemicals from roads. Read about how we're rewilding it here: https://t.co/x04GRodbUL
@LBofBexley @EnvAgency https://t.co/ZmTG6kHpPv

#economicskips truck reg WU68 LXO spewing litter out of open top garbage truck all the way down the A2 from Falconwood coast bound on Monday 1st March at 08:59. Unbelievable lack of duty of care by an authorised waste carrier. What you gonna do @EnvAgency? #nothing #useless https://t.co/GedOIh2787

tweets.text: #Panorama on #flytipping last night - good overview of this increasing problem. I thought @EnvAgency responses were weak and typically lacking in any real action. Why after >10 years of problems is it getting worse not better? Why is the carriers reg system still totally useless?
@PlanAbby @EnvAgency @TE2100Plan Congrats Abby, Sounds super exciting.

@nwgrnd_Flood @nwgrnd @EnvAgencyNW @unitedutilities @uugroupplc @AndynBrown16 @stewart_mounsey Each lesson pack will contain a PowerPoint lesson, a lesson plan with teacher‚Äôs notes, and resources such as worksheets or instructions for in-class exercises or homework! üìö 

https://t.co/IkjocZfOG1

The difference between #WwNP, #NFM and #NBS. Important to get the terminology right, especially when it's currently used very interchangeably (guilty)

Presented yesterday at #RRC2020 by Jon Hollis from the @EnvAgency https://t.co/VHiwJ51an3

Another busy week constructing #NFM interventions near #Kendal As always, to prevent the spread of non-native species & disease our machines üöú get a good wash & decontamination before moving to the next site. Do you #checkcleandry ? #biosecurity #invasivespeciesweek @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/dZGla146U2

Like #FreshwaterMussels? Check out this webinar I gave as part of @freshwaterbio's webinar series.  
Shout out to funders & partners @BiffaAward @unitedutilities @WestCumbriaRT @SCRiversTrust @DevonWildlife @northyorkmoors @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency 

https://t.co/rc8FwlHTNa https://t.co/fYbTX7ZTKL

@helenflynnCPT @cleanupbritain @ZilchUK @Widget57529543 @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson @EnvAgency @KeepBritainTidy Recycling plastics is a myth, just a lie; that has now led to #plasticpollution crisis

The issue of waste is pivotal & intertwined with major environmental issues like #climatechange, #pollution

Please Sign Petition: https://t.co/PZ420BtYd6

Mandate Warning Labels On #Plastics https://t.co/c8bCIQiIdv

@PlanAbby @EnvAgency @TE2100Plan Congratulations Abby - good luck in your new role!!
@hjb53 You need to contact Environment Agency for the fridge. Maybe on here for a start. Might need a different plan for for other stuff.

@RachSalv Rachel & @EnvAgencySE I note the ¬£2.3m fine for raw sewage in Thames at Henley. The revenue of Thames Water was ¬£2.2bn, so the fine was only 0.1% of revenue. Average salary in UK is ¬£35k, so 0.1% of that is ¬£36. Fine for dog poo is more at ¬£75 and up to ¬£1000 if goes to court.

Tomorrow we will launch #FosteringProsperity, our new report with @burohappold on the significant benefits of ambitious environmental #regulation. Join us with experts from @EnvAgency @suez @SMMT @WillmottDixon and @NestleUKI. Secure your place here: https://t.co/5qO4TzHkaG https://t.co/4KNSagwPRe

urls.title: Fostering Prosperity: driving innovation and creating market opportunities through environmental regulations
urls.description: Join us on 2 March 2021 at 9.30am - 11am for the launch of Aldersgate Group‚Äôs latest report, Fostering Prosperity, which focuses on how environmental regulation can accelerate business innovation, create new market opportunities, and promote job creation. The UK has set commendable objectives on the climate and environmental agenda.
